entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who killed Dumbledore. He is also mentioned in relation to the Ministry and Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being killed by Snape.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned as having a bitter tone when talking about Snape.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned in relation to Voldemort and Snape.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as being behind Snape.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a possible destination for teachers who do not stay.

entities.name: prophet
entities.description: The Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that Harry flips over to avoid looking at Snape's face.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is the house-elf who brings soup to the table.

relationships.description: The Ministry is associated with Voldemort.
Harry has a conflict with Snape.
Harry has a risk of being sent to Azkaban if he does not stay.
Kreacher brought soup to the table.
